meaningMnemonic: <radical>Flowers</radical> that grow in a <radical>rice paddy</radical> only live to be <kanji>seedling</kanji>s. Once they sprout, they're plucked away to make room for more rice. Poor little seedlings.
readingMnemonic: The <kanji>seedling</kanji>s try their best to blend in by referring to themselves as <reading>myou</reading> (みょう), you know, me and you combined. That's myou.
